title: Mayonaka No Ore Wo Mite
alternative_title: Behold Me at Night, ; 真夜中の俺を見て, 請注視深夜裡的我, My Noons & Midnights Are for You;
status: Behold Me at Night, ; 真夜中の俺を見て, 請注視深夜裡的我, My Noons & Midnights Are for You;
description:
Description :
        Chart-topper Vtuber Mayo, contrary to his bright and healing celebrity persona, is a deep-dyed pessimist. Despite having many fans, the only one checking him out from time to time is his manager. His inferiority complex with his on-screen persona drives Mayo further into depression+
